description.label: The placeholder of the dropdown
description.id: The id attribute for the select component. Will be prefixed with "select_"
description.required: If the element should be required
description.options: The options which can be selected. The key if the item will be used as value of the option and the value will be used as a label
description.preselected: Key of option to be preselected
description.multiple: Sets the select box to a multiple select
description.name: The name attribute for the select component
description.hidePlaceholder: Hides the placeholder but keeps the label
description.size: The size of the select component (sm, md, lg)
